Outstanding dedication to precision results in outstanding certifications by outstanding organizations

We have partnered with the following organizations to ensure our products and capabilities deliver the highest standards to our customers:

  • The American Society of Mechanical Engineers (ASME)
  • The American Welding Society (AWS)
  • The Submarine Industrial Base Council (SIBC)
  • The American Society for Nondestructive Testing (ASNTA)
  • The Steel Foundersâ€™ Society of America (SFSA)

Our Certifications include:

  • ASME Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code. Our ASME Certificate is a QSC Material Organization
  • United States Department of State ITAR Part 122 registration
  • Our team follows MIL-I-45208 and NAVSEA procedures
  • Nineteen Level III NDE personnel are in-house certified to ASNT-TC-1A and maintain training to MIL-STD, NAVSEA, ASME and ANSI requirements
  • Our welders are certified in GMAW, GTAW and SMAW procedures
